title: T-001: Integration testing
body:
Comprehensive integration tests for all features.

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] All features have integration tests
- [ ] 90%+ test coverage achieved
- [ ] All tests passing

## Effort Estimate

- Story Points: 2
- Hours: 16.0

title: T-002: Documentation
body:
Create comprehensive documentation for all features.

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] API documentation complete
- [ ] Usage examples added
- [ ] README updated

## Effort Estimate

- Story Points: 1
- Hours: 8.0
